channel.title: 667/723 Webclient
channel.description:
I'm trying to make a webclient, and I've followed tutorials exactly as it shows what to do, I jar the client and I sign it, and I've checked twice that it's done right and signed.
When I upload the Client.jar and the Index/Client.html, it crashes and says "click for error for details" and then it say's
"Incompatible magic value 1008813135 in class loader file"
I had this problem with a 712/742 webclient last night, but I fixed it, the same way I've tried to fix this, and it's not helping anything.
I've read that it's a 404 error on other help threads, but here's my HTML code,
Code: <html> <title> Dexfinity </title> <body onbeforeunload="javascript:alert('Be sure your account is logged out before closing this page!');"> <applet name="Dexfinity" width="100%" height="100%" archive="Client.jar" code="Loader.class" mayscript=""> <param name="worldid" value="2"/> <param name="members" value="1"/> <param name="modewhat" value="2"/> <param name="modewhere" value="2"/> <param name="safemode" value="1"/> <param name="lang" value="0"/> <param name="affid" value="0"/> <param name="settings" value="ROEqp2kbj*NX9PSCbdgpOvokkMwrCkXjg3c6KXgaLZY"/> <param name="cookieprefix" value=""/> <param name="cookiehost" value=".google.com"/> <param name="plug" value="0"/> <param name="js" value="1"/> <param name="game" value="0"/> <param name="colourid" value="0"/> </applet> </body> </html>

NP DAWG I use to have this problem

@Psykotic wrote:

Vodzila:

Did you upload your client.jar in a website?

Oh, thank you so much!#@ I owe you one ok

item.dc:creator: @Vodzila Vodzila
item.description:
@Vodzila wrote:

Did you upload your client.jar in a website?
^^^^
If you did that try changing it to
width=“765” height=“503”
If that works tell me
